name: Gerble Life
description:
Live your Gerble Life by going out and finding acorns. Maybe adventure awaits, maybe just acorns do. 

-- CONTROLS -- 

WASD/Arrow Keys - Move

Z/J - Interact/Pick up/Push Pull

X/K - Jump

Enter - Select
